text: Fița Lovin (née Rafira on 14 January 1951) is a retired middle-distance runner from Romania. She competed at the 1980 and 1984 Olympics and won the bronze medal in 800 metres in 1984. She also won the European 1500 m indoor title in 1984 and a silver medal at the 1982 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, placing fourth in 1985. ==References== Category:Romanian female middle- distance runners Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic athletes of Romania Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Romania Category:Olympic bronze medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Romania Category:World Athletics Indoor Championships medalists
title: Fița Lovin
